page.title: 03STOKE CANON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Stoke Canon Primary School is beside the main road which runs through the middle of Stoke Canon.At the moment the school has 59 children and two teachers.Mr.M.Hunt who is the Headmaster,and takes class 1,and Mrs.J.Hazelden who takes the infants, class 2.There are also two supply teachers who come in,Mrs Buckley who takes class 1 and P.E.,and Mrs Ellsworthy who also takes class 1. There are 13 4th years,11 3rd years, 12 2nd years and 5 1st years.Then there are 18 infants in Mrs Hazelden's class.Mrs Wainwright and Mrs Jacques look after us in the dinner hour, and Mrs Horne cooks the meals. Miss Norman and Mrs Johns are our cleaning ladies . We have an outdoor swimming pool which we use in the summer. The school is about 120 years old.
